scenario_text.value: Ack! *huff* *huff* *huff*...
Floramon, you look hurt!

Damn it!
*huff* *huff*...
Vegiemon, you look hurt!
*huff* *huff*...
Blossomon, you look hurt!
*huff* *huff*... I’m not...done...yet...
Ceresmon, you look hurt!
Aaaugh... *huff* *huff*...
Ceresmon Medium, you look hurt!
Grr... That smarts...
Ebonwumon, you look hurt!

Oh, this is not looking good! What am I gonna
do? What am I gonna do?!
Is this the end?
Saki!
(Saki’s starting to panic!)
(I have to calm her down somehow!)
Saki! Snap out of it!

If you don’t keep it together, Floramon is
going to lose it too!

If you don’t keep it together, Vegiemon is
going to lose it too!

If you don’t keep it together, Blossomon is
going to lose it too!

If you don’t keep it together, Ceresmon is
going to lose it too!

If you don’t keep it together, Ceresmon
Medium is going to lose it too!

If you don’t keep it together, Ebonwumon is
going to lose it too!
Wha...?! You’re right, I forgot!

It’s not just Floramon fighting out there.
I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Floramon!

Hee hee! Feels like Saki’s ready to give this
her all too!

It’s not just Vegiemon fighting out there.
I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Vegiemon!

Kekeke! Seems like Saki’s really into this
now!

It’s not just Blossomon fighting out there.
I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Blossomon!

Seems like Saki’s got her fighting spirit
back.

It’s not just Ceresmon fighting out there.
I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Ceresmon!
Ah, such a rush of courage and strength!

It’s not just Ceresmon Medium fighting out
there. I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Ceresmon Medium!

I can feel it, feel my bond with Saki. It’s
full of warmth, and it gives me strength!

It’s not just Ebonwumon fighting out there.
I’m in this too!
After all, our hearts are connected!
Ebonwumon!
Ah, Saki, what a beautiful smile.
Yeah. I am done getting pushed around!

Just a little more, Floramon! And when this
is over, I will give you the royal treatment!
Right!

Just a little more, Vegiemon! And when this
is over, I will give you the royal treatment!
Hurrah!

Just a little more, Blossomon! And when this
is over, I will give you the royal treatment!
Yeah!

Just a little more, Ceresmon! And when this
is over, I will give you the royal treatment!
I’m on it!

Just a little more, Ceresmon Medium! And when
this is over, you get the royal treatment!
Yes, I’ll be looking forward to it!

Just a little more, Ebonwumon! And when this
is over, I will give you the royal treatment!

You don’t say! Ah, the pleasures of a long
life.
